REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1759 reute r f BC-DHL-WORLDWIDE-EXPRESS 04-13 0060

TEXT.TITLE: DHL WORLDWIDE EXPRESS BROADENS NETWORK
TEXT.BODY:
<DHL Worldwide Express> added 35 overseas and 10 domestic service centers to its delivery network. The private air express company said one of the additions includes the German Democratic Republic (East Germany), bringing to eight the number of Eastern Bloc countries it serves.
Reuter
